name: YouTube - Blue-Gray Background (Classic layout)
description:
YouTube with Blue-Gray Background for the Classic layout only. In 2017 Youtube introduced a new layout. This style works only on the pre-2017 layout (the Classic layout).
In order to switch back to the Classic layout you need to click your channel icon in the top right to pop-up a menu, then click "Restore classic YouTube" at the bottom of its list.

Links to visited videos on the related videos sidebar have different color.

If you install this style and also install a greasemonkey userscript named "youtube-right-side-description" -  https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/976-youtube-right-side-description - then the likes/dislikes bar will be almost covered by the like/dislike buttons.
So in that case (and ONLY in that case) install my style 112269 and the issue will be fixed.

See also my :
style 53623
and style 100866
and style 98129

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.

additional_info:
2010,April 5 - Updated script for the new YouTube design.
2010,April 10 - Updated the You Tube search results page
2010 July 17 - Major changes
2011 March 30 - enabled also on the 'https' pages
2011 July 24 - compatible with Youtube - Better Watch Page userscript ( BWP userscript).
2011 September 14 - From now on the script won't change the font size. To make the font size bigger (mainly the font size of the comments) see my style 53623.
2011 December 18 - support for the new video manager (playlists and more)
2012 March 2 - Support for YouTube's homepage (the subscriptions page).
2012 December 8 - a first fix after Youtube new redesign
2012 December 11 - Fixed some lines (regexp lines) which caused a problem to Chrome Users.
2012 December 24 - added again YT search results page
2013 May 10 - fixed YT search results
2013 September 08 - Back to normal. Accidentally last week I updated this page with my google.com userstyle. Sorry.
2013 September 21 - fixed YT's gray text on the new User's profile popup tooltip
2013 November - compatible with Youtube's new comments system
2017 June - Better comments
